sentences.en: The pastor requested the women present to join him in prayer.
sentences.cn: 该牧师请在场的妇女和他一起祈祷。

sentences.en: Few things distracted the pastor from the preparation of his weekly sermons.
sentences.cn: 几乎没有什么事情使该牧师从他每周布道的准备中分心。

sentences.en: I am sure, Mr. Pastor, you will not do so.
sentences.cn: 我相信，牧师先生，你不会这样做的。
